title: KHR_audio_graph Wave Shaper Node
description: Applies waveshaping distortion to an audio signal.

id.description: A unique identifier of the wave shaper node in the scene.

amount.description: Distortion intensity in [0..1]; implementations may map this to a shaping curve (e.g., tanh).

oversample.description: Optional oversampling factor for distortion quality.

curve.description: Optional explicit shaping curve as a normalized array in [-1..1].

bypass.description: Disables this processor while still allowing unprocessed audio signals to pass.

channelInterpretation.description: Channel ordering for speaker channel interpretation are captured here.
